TopicTitle: Anyone have a astronomers visual pack for 1.0.4?

Articles.Content: I heard it doesn't work since it hasn't been updated and the 1.0.2 astronomers pack on reddit download link doesn't work, so does anyone have a 1.0-1.0.4 AP they could upload?
have you checked the thread for it? I think people have figured out how to get it working. I use AVP: Edge of Oblivion and it doesn't need any tweaking at all, it just works.

have you checked the thread for it? I think people have figured out how to get it working. I use AVP: Edge of Oblivion and it doesn't need any tweaking at all, it just works.

haven't tried it actually yet, just seeing if there was a 1.0.4 tweak for it. Also, the link from the EOO trailer sends me to interstellar.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/projects/astronomers-visual-pack-interstellar-v2

Download on the right.

same one i've been downloading. so it should work without problems?
CKAN simply installs AVP, either in whole or as individual components, without hitches on my 1.0.4 install. You shouldn't need to do anything specific to make it work.

same one i've been downloading. so it should work without problems?

Edge of Oblivion will (that is why I have you that link, you said you couldn't find it, it is the third one down), I have no idea if Interstellar will, I don't use it, it looks bad anyway.
I just installed AVP from CKAN, works fine in 1.0.4.

fk manually install avp messed up my KSP...

- - - Updated - - -

fk manually install avp messed up my KSP...

now i have to reinstall it....

Edited October 2, 2015 by Red Iron Crown
Language, please.

Some textures inside ..\GameData\BoulderCo\Clouds\Textures are not power of two. That are kerbin1.png which is 8192*4167 instead of 8192*4096 from the base mod and

altostratus.png (8192*4618), cirrus.png(4096*2309), jool1.png(4096*2275), joolLayers1.png(4096*2309) and joolLayers2.png(4096*2309) from the Clouds for Eve and Jool Pack.

I resized them to be proper power of two, ie 8192*4096 or 4096*2048 or 2048*1024 and also resized all the 8k textures to be only 4k and that made it work for me.

I have AVP: Interstellar V2 working on my install of KSP. I manually installed it although I did skip installing the sun flares as somebody (can't remember who or where) said that sun flares from it were broken because of certain assets being located in a different location than they were when the mod was originally released.
